articles.description: Mexican authorities said they are studying the case of a 32-year-old female doctor who was hospitalized after receiving the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine.
articles.content: FILE PHOTO: A medical worker receives an injection with a dose of the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine at the Regional Military Specialty Hospital in San Nicolas de los Garza, on the outskirts of Mon… [+1076 chars]

articles.title: Maine CDC reports 343 COVID-19 cases, seven more deaths - Press Herald
articles.description: The seven-day average for new daily cases is now at a whopping 529.3, but Maine is among the fastest states to distribute the vaccine.
articles.content: The Maine Center for Disease Control and Prevention on Saturday reported 343 cases of the novel coronavirus and seven additional deaths, adding to the growing surge in infections even as health offic… [+3677 chars]

articles.author: Killian Meara
articles.title: COVID-19 Patients Brain Show Damage - Contagionlive.com
articles.description: The virus may have been cleared by the time of death or viral copy numbers were below the level of detection.
articles.content: In a recent study conducted by the National Institutes of Health, investigators routinely observed spotted hallmarks of damage caused by thinning and leaky brain blood vessels in tissue samples of pa… [+2348 chars]
